ygData.subject: Re: Jboots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I heard the same thing about the SK armor with one additional note - as of the 10th, the SK armor quest was still broken. Go figure! 8p I hope they get it
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Jonathan" <jp1234@...>
>
>There's going to be class only armor for every different class. The SK
>quests are found in Mistmoore on the test server right now, however I have
>not heard the specs of them.. but so far Rogue greaves, Ranger arms, etc
>have been the same AC as rubi but the bracer was 1 less due to the
>dexterity
>buff. I'm certain the SK armor will be comparable.

I heard the same thing about the SK armor with one additional note - as of
the 10th, the SK armor quest was still broken. Go figure! 8p I hope they get
it fixed in time for the patch!
